replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content: MCEedit  这个可以辅助进行区块操作

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content: 找到该世界下的文件夹 打开一个regin的文件夹吧，删除区块代号的mca就ok

replies.txt_content:
